Model module

class Model.NSurrogatesModel(input_size, output_size, hidden_size, n_surrog)[source]

Bases: Module

A class that represents a model composed of multiple surrogate neural networks and a main neural network.

This class is used to manage multiple surrogate models and a main model. The surrogate models and the main model are all instances of the NeuralNet class, each with their own input and output sizes, hidden layer sizes, and activation functions.

main_net

The main neural network.

Type:

NeuralNet

n_surrog

The number of surrogate networks.

Type:

int

surrog_nets

The list of surrogate networks.

Type:

nn.ModuleList

Parameters:

  • input_size (int) – The number of input features for the main neural network.

  • output_size (int) – The number of output units for the main neural network.

  • hidden_size (tuple) – The size of the hidden layers for the main neural network. Each element represents the size of a specific hidden layer.

  • n_surrog (int) – The number of surrogate networks to be created.

add_surrogate(input_size, output_size, hidden_size=(100,), activ_f='relu')[source]

Adds a new surrogate network to the model.

Parameters:

  • input_size (int) – The number of input features for the new surrogate network.

  • output_size (int) – The number of output units for the new surrogate network.

  • hidden_size (tuple, optional) – The size of the hidden layers for the new surrogate network. Each element represents the size of a specific hidden layer. Default is (100,).

  • activ_f (str, optional) – The activation function to use in the new surrogate network. Default is “relu”.

forward(x)[source]

Perform a forward pass on the main network.

Parameters:

x (torch.Tensor) – The input data.

Returns:

The output of the network.

Return type:

torch.Tensor

freeze_main()[source]

Freeze the parameters of the main network, preventing them from being updated during training.

freeze_surrogates()[source]

Freeze the parameters of the surrogate networks, preventing them from being updated during training.

training: bool
unfreeze_main()[source]

Unfreeze the parameters of the main network, allowing them to be updated during training.

unfreeze_surrogates()[source]

Unfreeze the parameters of the surrogate networks, allowing them to be updated during training.
